response.name: getCurrentChairman
response.body:
{
    "code": 200,
    "message": "Chairman information retrieved successfully",
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name_bangla": " .   ",
        "name_english": "Professor Dr. Taiabur Rahman\"",
        "designation_bangla": ",    ",
        "designation_english": "Director, Nazmul Karim Study Center",
        "bio_bangla": ",   \r\n (),   ,  \r\n,    (-)\r\n,    ,    \r\n,  ,   , ",
        "bio_english": "Dr. Taiabur Rahman is a Professor of Development Studies and Acting Dean of the Faculty of Social Sciences at the University of Dhaka. He previously served as Dean of the School of Liberal Arts and Social Sciences at Independent University, Bangladesh (IUB), and as Chair of the Department of Development Studies at the University of Dhaka. His international academic experience includes serving as Associate Professor and Chair of Public Administration at KIMEP University, Kazakhstan.\r\n\r\nDr. Rahman holds a PhD in Public Policy and Governance from the City University of Hong Kong, along with Bachelors and Masters degrees in Public Administration from the University of Dhaka, and an MPhil from the University of Bergen, Norway. A prolific scholar, he has published widely in national and international peer-reviewed journals and is the author of Parliamentary Control and Government Accountability in South Asia (Routledge). He is also an experienced reviewer for leading international publishers and journals.\r\n\r\nWith extensive consultancy experience for national and international organizations, Dr. Rahmans research interests span Public Policy and Governance, Comparative Politics, and Development Studies. He is widely recognized for his expertise in international accreditation of tertiary education institutions and for his contributions as a researcher, resource person, and development practitioner.",
        "qualifications": "ph.D.\tPublic Administration\tCity University of Hong Kong\tHong Kong\t2005\r\nM.Phil.\tPublic Administration\tUniversity of Bergen\tNorway\t2000\r\nMasters\tPublic Administrtaion\tUniversity of Dhaka\tBangladesh\t1991\r\nBachelor\tPublic Administration\tUniversity of Dhaka\tBangladesh\t1990",
        "qualifications_list": [
            "ph.D.\tPublic Administration\tCity University of Hong Kong\tHong Kong\t2005",
            "M.Phil.\tPublic Administration\tUniversity of Bergen\tNorway\t2000",
            "Masters\tPublic Administrtaion\tUniversity of Dhaka\tBangladesh\t1991",
            "Bachelor\tPublic Administration\tUniversity of Dhaka\tBangladesh\t1990"
        ],
        "current_positions": "Director, Nazmul Karim Study Center",
        "current_positions_list": [
            "Director, Nazmul Karim Study Center"
        ],
        "previous_positions": "",
        "previous_positions_list": [],
        "email": "taiaburrahman.dvs@du.ac.bd",
        "phone": "+88-01817590525",
        "profile_image": null,
        "signature_image": null,
        "is_active": true,
